english.segment1: You'll have your ups and downs. Don't let them push you out. Cause time is all you've got now
english.segment2: Go make the best of everything you want to be. With ambition pushing forward. Your dreams upon your shoulders
english.segment3: Though impossible it seems. It's time to just believe. From here on out you're just getting older. Pick up yourself you keep getting closer
english.segment4: (Chorus). Let's just get it started tonight. All you've ever wanted its in your eyes. Just let it take you where you wanna to go. Just let it tell you what you wanna to know
english.segment5: You've got your destination. Progress has now been made and you. Will see the way you've wanted it to be
english.segment6: We've only just begun. There's gold that lies in us. Your hesitation's held you long enough
english.segment7: Though impossible it seems. It's time to just believe. From here on out you're just getting older. Pick up yourself you keep getting closer
english.segment10: Just let it get you where you wanna go oh woah (oh woah) (oh woah)
english.segment11: The future holds a brighter day for you. You may ask yourself tonight. Is it out of reach, out of reach, Is it out of reach is it out of reach, Out of reach, or am I? or am I?
english.segment13: Let's just get this started. (Where you are tonight). All you've ever wanted. (It's in your eyes). Just let it take you where you want to go. Just let it tell you what you want to know. Just let it take you where you want to go.
